meta.min_funds_requirement: Must have hotel booking for duration of stay (Discover Qatar hotel often mandatory for certain visas)

add.title: Discover Qatar Hotel Booking
add.description: For Visa on Arrival or specific e-visas, booking via Discover Qatar website is mandatory.

add.title: Health Insurance
add.description: Mandatory health insurance from a MOPH-registered provider (approx. 50 QAR).

steps_flow.title: Hayya Portal
steps_flow.description: Register on the Hayya Portal (Official Qatar Visa Platform).

steps_flow.title: Upload Docs
steps_flow.description: Upload passport, photo, and accommodation details.

steps_flow.title: Receive Hayya Entry Visa
steps_flow.description: Receive the entry permit via email.
